ygData.subject: Re: Get ready to battle
ygData.msgSnippet: My weapons will remain offline, that way if we run across any of my kind I will appear as your captive, not your guest. He looked toward Hysteria and thought

"My weapons will remain offline, that way if we run across any of my 
kind I will appear as your captive, not your guest." He looked toward 
Hysteria and thought this way any stray fire will hit you two first.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster nods. "I'll lead then. If anyone fires at you, though, 
don't be so 
> eager to unload on them, I'll take care of it."
> 
> Kluster begins to walk down the corridor, pausing sligtly to let 
Phobia catch 
> up.
